content: I cannot predict the future plans of popular mechanics. however, it is possible that popular mechanics may consider incorporating more interactive and immersive experiences into their online content in the future. virtual and augmented reality is becoming more popular, and many brands are experimenting with these technologies to create engaging experiences for their audience. by incorporating these technologies into their online content, popular mechanics has the potential to provide their readers with a unique and interactive learning experience, which could help to captivate their audience and increase engagement. nevertheless, it's up to popular mechanics and their digital media team to decide if they want to explore these technologies and if it makes sense for their brand and target audience.
